verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Hallelujah, Hallelujah, For The Lord God Almightly Reign (2X)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Holy, Holy
Are You Lord God Almighty
Worthy is the Lamb
Worthy is the Lamb
You are Holy, Holy

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Are You Lord God Almighty
Worthy is the Lamb
Worthy is the Lamb
Amen

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Hallelujah, Hallelujah, For Our Lord God Almightly Regin (2X)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Are You Lord God Almighty
Worthy Is the Lamb
Worthy Is the Lamb
(Repeat)
